map.name: GetBattleOutcome
map.note: whether the player gets a game over from losing is determined by the battle script. should also be a value for 4.

map.name: DoNpcDefeat
map.note: kills parent's defeat script and replaces it with an instance of 80077E38

map.name: StartBattle
map.note: begins a battle with the NPC's assigned encounter

map.name: StartBattleWith
map.note: same as the previous, but you can set the song

map.name: BindNpcAI
map.note: ("NpcAI")

map.name: BindNpcIdle
map.note: ("Idle")  -- paused while the interaction prompt is active, executes after init is done

map.name: RestartNpcAI
map.note: kills the current AI script and launches a new copy

map.name: EnableNpcAI
map.note: pauses/unpauses AI script for a given npc

map.name: SetNpcAux
map.note: kills the current aux script and launches a new one from $Script

map.name: BindNpcAux
map.note: ("Aux") -- helper script that executes after init script is done, loop for a continous background script

map.name: RestartNpcAux
map.note: kills the current aux script and launches a new copy

map.name: EnableNpcAux
map.note: pauses/unpauses aux script for a given npc

map.name: BindNpcInteract
map.note: ("Interact")

map.name: BindNpcHit
map.note: ("Hit")

map.name: BindNpcDefeat
map.note: ("Defeat") -- executes after battle

map.name: SetNpcVar
map.note: sets (&NPC + 6C + 4*index) to value, looks like there are 16 of them

map.name: SetOwnerFlags
map.note: directly sets flags of parent NPC

map.name: ShowCoinCounter
map.note: shows coin counter in lower left hand corner

map.name: GetEntryID
map.note: returns the entrance ID that the player used to enter the current map

map.name: GetMapID
map.note: used by the forever forest maps (mim_*) to load current ID to a game byte

map.name: GetLoadType
map.note: used for spawning the player at save points

map.name: NpcJump0
map.note: calls 802CE434 with A2 :         IS THIS FOR FLYING?

map.name: NpcJump1
map.note: calls 802CE434 with A2 : 1

map.name: NpcJumpX
map.note: moves an npc in a parabolic arc

map.name: InterpNpcYaw
map.note: turns gradually over some number of frames (however, turn animation will often be abrupt)

map.name: NpcFacePlayer
map.note: set yaw to face player

map.name: NpcFaceNpc
map.note: set yaw to face other NPC

map.name: DisablePartnerAI
map.note: ??? -- partner will no longer try to follow mario, still has physics though

map.name: EnablePartnerAI
map.note: enables follow player AI

map.name: BringPartnerOut
map.note: brings out temporary extra partner, Npc:Partner will refer to this temporary partner until they are put away

map.name: PutPartnerAway
map.note: puts away a temporary partner

map.name: ShowMessage
map.note: used by signs and NPCs that cannot be seen, speech bubble doesn't connect to anything

map.name: ShowChoice
map.note: chosen index will be returned in *Var[0]

map.name: DisablePlayerPhysics
map.note: disables gravity, automatic animations (falling, etc), camera controller updates, but NOT partner AI

map.name: PlayerFaceNpc
map.note: set player yaw to face npc

map.name: GetPlayerAnimation
map.note: return player[C8]

map.name: FullyRestoreHPandFP
map.note: no args

map.name: FullyRestoreSP
map.note: no args

map.name: DisablePulseStone
map.note: sets a flag that make pulse stone appear on sbk maps

battle.name: UseCamPreset
battle.note: if (byte) 80280CE0 != 0, index into jump table at 8029CC48... [8024CFA8]

battle.name: SetCamTarget
battle.note: sets the camera target position

battle.name: SetCamOffsetZ
battle.note: bugged? treats z offset as a short rather than a byte.

battle.name: AddCamOffsetZ
battle.note: unused and bugged. treats z offset as a short rather than a byte.

battle.name: FreezeCam
battle.note: sets (byte) 80280CE0

battle.name: CamTargetActor
battle.note: if (byte) 80280CE0 != 0, delegates to func_8024E43C, which sets (short) 8029F27C = actorID

battle.name: SetDmaTableLoadDest
battle.note: sets the destination for the next function, overriding the default value specified in the table

battle.name: LoadFromDmaTable
battle.note: loads one of the entries in the current battle sections DmaTable

battle.name: PlaySoundAtActor
battle.note: ### args : actorID, soundID

battle.name: PlaySoundAtSprite
battle.note: ### args : actorID, spriteIndex, soundID

battle.name: MultiplyByActorScale
battle.note: multiplies a scalar by an actor's scale factor (actor[188])

battle.name: MultiplyVec2ByActorScale
battle.note: multiplies 2D vector by an actor's scale factor (actor[188])

battle.name: MultiplyVec3ByActorScale
battle.note: multiplies 3D vector by an actor's scale factor (actor[188])

battle.name: IncrementPlayerHP
battle.note: no args, will not exceed maximum

battle.name: IncrementPlayerFP
battle.note: no args, will not exceed maximum

battle.name: GetBlockResult
battle.note: returns result of most recent block attempt, 0 for fail, 1 for success, -1 for fail on mashing

battle.name: SetGoalToHome
battle.note: sets goal position to NPC's home position

battle.name: SetGoalToIndex
battle.note: sets goal position to a standard indexed location (table at 80283524)

battle.name: GetIndexFromPos
battle.note: gets the nearest home index given an actor's current position

battle.name: GetIndexFromHome
battle.note: gets the nearest home index given an actor's home position

battle.name: ForceHomePos
battle.note: sets home position and teleports there

battle.name: SetGoalToTarget
battle.note: sets goal to the position of the actor's target

battle.name: SetGoalToPos
battle.note: note: skips any arg = FF439EB2 (-12345678`)

battle.name: AddToGoalPos
battle.note: adjust goal position

battle.name: GetSpriteOffset
battle.note: if sprite[0] & 00100000 return sprite[2C/30/34] else return sprite[14/16/18] ...not consistent with other SpriteOffset functions!

battle.name: SetSpritePos
battle.note: if sprite[0] & 00100000 set sprite[2C/30/34] to x/y/z, else set sprite[14/16/18] to x/y/z

battle.name: SetEnemyTargetOffset
battle.note: only works for enemy actors: actorID = 020X

battle.name: AddActorPos
battle.note: adds to current position

battle.name: GetSpriteOffset2
battle.note: if sprite[0] & 00100000, return sprite[1A/1C/1E], else return sprite[14/16/18]

battle.name: SetSpriteOffset
battle.note: if sprite[0] & 00100000, set sprite[1A/1C/1E] to x/y/z, else set sprite[14/16/18] to x/y/z

battle.name: AddSpriteOffset
battle.note: if sprite[0] & 00100000, add dx/dy/dz to sprite[1A/1C/1E], else add dx/dy/dz to sprite[14/16/18]

battle.name: ActorVarAdd
battle.note: adds amount to variable

battle.name: SpriteVarAdd
battle.note: adds amount to variable

battle.name: SetActorRotation
battle.note: center of rotation is at base of sprite, use F1194D80 on any field to skip it

battle.name: SetActorRotationOffset
battle.note: offsets the center of rotation from default position (bottom center)

battle.name: SetSpriteRotationOffset
battle.note: offsets the center of rotation from default position (bottom center)

battle.name: HPBarToHome
battle.note: ### args : actorID, sets the location of the HP bar to home + hp offset

battle.name: GetOwnerID
battle.note: returns the actorID of a script owner

battle.name: SetOwnerID
battle.note: set script owner to some actorID

battle.name: InitTargetIterator
battle.note: no args

battle.name: BoostAttack
battle.note: icons for amount > 3 does not display correctly

battle.name: DamageEnemy
battle.note: read doc: "Damage and Event System"

battle.name: PowerBounceEnemy
battle.note: identical to DamageEnemy, used only for Power Bounce

battle.name: CheckEnemyHit
battle.note: read doc: "Damage and Event System"

battle.name: BindTakeTurn
battle.note: binds a script to execute when their turn begins

battle.name: BindIdle
battle.note: binds a script to execute while idle (goombas shuffle back and forth, etc)

battle.name: BindHandleEvent
battle.note: binds a script to respond to battle events

battle.name: BindNextTurn
battle.note: binds a script to the start/end of player/enemy turns (4 events), discriminate with GetBattlePhase

battle.name: JumpSpriteA
battle.note: strange (bugged?) function signature that ignores the last argument. this is the only version that is called though!

battle.name: JumpSpriteB
battle.note: always creates dust effect

battle.name: RunSpriteTo
battle.note: moves with a trail of dust behind

battle.name: GetEventType
battle.note: --- maybe GetLastEvent?

battle.name: SetTargetActor
battle.note: sets the attack target of one actor, also sets (byte) actor[426] = 1

battle.name: RemoveActor
battle.note: removes an actor

battle.name: DropStarPoints
battle.note: causes star points to spew out

battle.name: DamageTarget
battle.note: used to damage Mario/partner/sometimes other enemies

battle.name: SetTargetOffset
battle.note: more commonly used variant of func_8026B0A0, works on any actor

battle.name: YieldTurn
battle.note: Sets battle[0] bit 00200000

battle.name: GetLevel
battle.note: gets the level of an enemy or the rank of a partner

battle.name: InflictStatusP
battle.note: used by partners to afflict enemies with status effects, has an extra argument to allow variable chance to inflict

battle.name: CheckTargetHitP
battle.note: used by partner moves to check whether attacks will hit enemies

common.name: hasMerleeCasts
common.note: stores result on *Var[0]

common.name: GetModelCenter
common.note: returns on *VAR[0] *VAR[1] *VAR[2]

common.name: SetTexPanner
common.note: sets a model's panID and sets the texture pan flag

common.name: GetColliderCenter
common.note: returns on *VAR[0] *VAR[1] *VAR[2]

common.name: ParentColliderToModel
common.note: associates a model with a collider and applies the model's transformation

common.name: UpdateColliderTransform
common.note: applies transformation from parent model

common.name: SetCamPerspective
common.note: this type is NOT the same camera type from zones, fortunately it is ALWAYS 3 here

common.name: SetCamBGColor
common.note: components are in range 0-255, this is almost always black (0,0,0). only ice palace is different.

common.name: PanToTarget
common.note: pans the camera with a cosine easing function at the ends

common.name: UseSettingsFrom
common.note: camera will use control settings from the zone corresponding to a given sampling point

common.name: WaitForCam
common.note: checks if the camera has completed its assigned motion yet

common.name: ResetCam
common.note: copies settings from the player's zone and pans to the player at a given speed

common.name: PlayModelAnimation
common.note: format not reverse-engineered

common.name: GetCurrentPartner
common.note: returns partner index from 8010F2A2

common.name: UpdateLerp
common.note: no args

common.name: RandInt
common.note: API wrapper for GetRandom

common.name: GetAngleToNPC
common.note: angle from player toward NPC

common.name: GetAngleToPlayer
common.note: angle from NPC toward player

common.name: AwaitPlayerApproach
common.note: pauses the script until the player comes within a certain radius of point (X,Z)

common.name: IsPlayerWithin
common.note: returns whether the player is within a certain radius of point (X,Z)

common.name: AwaitPlayerLeave
common.note: pauses the script until the player moves beyond a certain radius from point (X,Z)

common.name: AddVectorPolar
common.note: offsets a point (X,Z) by a vector given by length and angle

common.name: GetNextPathPos
common.note: no args

common.name: SetValueByRef
common.note: sets the variable referenced by arg0 to the value of arg1                     X = GetVar(arg0), Y = GetVar(arg1), SetVar(X, Y)

common.name: GetValueByRef
common.note: gets the value held by the variable referenced in arg0 and copies it to arg1  X = GetVar(arg0), Y = GetVar(X), SetVar(arg1, Y)

common.name: ClampFloat
common.note: clamps to range 0-360

common.name: PlaySoundAtF
common.note: we get looping sounds if the upper byte is 80

common.name: RemoveKeyItemAt
common.note: removes key item at index

common.name: RemoveBadge
common.note: unequips and removes badge from inventory

common.name: SetSpriteShading
common.note: sets the shading effect on character sprites (but not items) in dark areas
